query:
SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM time_series) as time_series_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM economic_events) as events_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM research_publications) as publications_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM indicators) as indicators_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM glossary_terms) as glossary_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM webhooks) as webhooks_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM connector_thresholds) as thresholds_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM alerts) as alerts_count
